name: Walk or Die
description:
This is our game submission for the 2022 Global Game Jam. In the game you play as a bomb. You have 2 timers on the top of the screen. As you walk the movement timer ticks down and if you stay still the still timer ticks down. Try to balance them as you progress through this puzzle platformer. There are 2 levels in this game.

Made by: Abraham, Yasmine, and Bryant

Cave Tileset by GrafxKid (itch.io)
